name: Cyber Surfer
description:
Drag to surf and enjoy yourself in the music world!!
In this world you’re a cyberpunk-style knight. Come on take a ride on your hover board ! We can find a way out with these fantastic lightening sabers.

How to play:
Move your finger to control the surfer moving from side to side.
Attention：
Don’t touch the different colors!
Be careful with the inter space.
Colors may be changed sometimes!

Game features:
Simplest way to control but coolest game showed.
Unique game scenes mixed with music sounds.
Smashing experience with fun and delight.
More surprises waiting for you!

It’s the most fashionable music game of 2021! Who else hasn’t played it yet is out of the date. If you love music, you love it.
Download now!!!

If any producer or label has an issue with any of the music used in the game, please send email to us and it will be deleted immediately if necessary (this includes the images used).

Contact us:
Are you having problems? Send an email to contact@badsnowball.com
